title: 경험 공유 심화 (I've been to/I've never)

sentences.en: I have been to Europe. (variant 1)
I have never tried that kind of food. (variant 1)
Have you ever seen that movie? (variant 1)
I have tried skydiving. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그들은 그런 경험을 해본 적이 없습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: They have never had such an experience. (variant 1)
He was the kindest person I have ever met. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그곳에 몇 번 가본 적이 있어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I have been there several times. (variant 1)
I have never heard of such a thing. (variant 1)
I have recently read an interesting book. (variant 1)
Have you ever learned that language? (variant 1)
I have been to Europe. (variant 2)
I have never tried that kind of food. (variant 2)
Have you ever seen that movie? (variant 2)
I have tried skydiving. (variant 2)
